content: juliet shawl shown above size large 2 skeins of cascade heritage silk 437 yards / skein in christmas red size small 1 skein of blue heron sock plus 420 yards / skein in pansy © corrie purdum this pattern is intended for personal use only yarn requirements 420 880 yards fingering weight yarn needle us size 5 3 75mm or size to obtain gauge gauge unblocked in stockinette stitch 13 stitches and 15 row = 2 inches as with most lace work gauge is not critical however changes to gauge will alter amount of yarn used an optional smaller edging is provided for those running short of yarn finished dimensions size large blocked 53 inches across 28 inches from neck to bottom edge size small blocked 41 inches across 21 inches from neck to bottom edge customizable shawl size the pattern lists 2 shawl sizes small and large however shawl size is completely customizable to allow for maximum yarn use simply stop after any increase section and proceed to edging edging yardage edging a including bind-off will take approximately two and a half times the yardage of the final increase section example if final increase took 10 grams edging and bind off will take approximately 25 grams of yarn yarn requirements listed above are for edging a edging b including bind-off will take approximately one a half time the yardage of the final increase section if final increase took 10 grams
